text: Friars Club can refer to: ==Organizations== * Friars Club of Beverly Hills, also known as the "Friars Club of California" * New York Friars Club * The Friars (club), Louisiana State University, also known as "The Friars Club" ==Other uses== * Friar's Inn, a 1920s jazz venue in Chicago, called "Friars Club" in some sources * "The Friar's Club", the 128th episode of Seinfeld ==See also== * The Friars Senior Society of the University of Pennsylvania, commonly nicknamed "Friars" * The Friar Society, the oldest honor society at University of Texas at Austin
title: Friars Club
